metadata.title: CVE-2024-12797 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - high
metadata.description:
RFC7250 handshakes with unauthenticated servers don't abort as expected

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl3t64 - 3.3.1-2ubuntu2.1
openssl - 3.3.1-2ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openssl package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.3.1-2ubuntu2.1').
